actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider selection logic to automatically failover to a healthy LLM provider if the current one is unresponsive or error-prone. This improves system resilience and user experience.
implementation_steps: Design a simple circuit breaker class or utility (open/half-open/closed states, failure thresholds, reset timers).
Integrate the circuit breaker into provider request logic: track failures, open circuit on threshold, auto-retry after cooldown.
Add logging for circuit breaker state changes.
Write a basic test to simulate provider failure and verify failover.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach a unique correlation ID to each incoming request and propagate it through backend services and logs for improved traceability and debugging.
implementation_steps: Generate a UUID for each incoming request in middleware.
Attach the correlation ID to the request object and response headers.
Update logging utilities to include the correlation ID in all log entries.
Test by making a request and verifying the correlation ID appears in logs and responses.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage for MCP provider endpoints, focusing on health checks, error handling, and switching logic.
implementation_steps: Identify untested MCP endpoint scenarios (e.g., provider down, latency spikes, error responses).
Write new Jest tests to cover these cases.
Run the test suite and ensure all tests pass.
Document new test cases in the test report.

actionable_tasks.title: Optimize Dockerfile for Multi-Stage Builds and Caching
actionable_tasks.description: Refactor the Dockerfile(s) for backend and frontend to use multi-stage builds, reducing image size and improving build cache efficiency.
implementation_steps: Update Dockerfile to use builder and runtime stages.
Move dependency installation and build steps to the builder stage.
Copy only necessary artifacts to the runtime stage.
Test build and run locally to verify reduced image size and correct functionality.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement MongoDB TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Add TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes to MongoDB collections storing telemetry data to automatically expire and remove old records, improving storage efficiency.
implementation_steps: Identify telemetry collections requiring TTL (e.g., logs, metrics).
Add index creation logic with expireAfterSeconds in database initialization.
Test by inserting sample data and verifying automatic expiration.
Document TTL policy in code comments.
